page.title: 03Housing
page.content: The houses in the village are mainly cottages of various sizes,plus a small council estate.There are a number of listed buildings which have been renovated and kept in character. Buildings such as the old post office,the old chapel and the vicarage are all privately owned.As some of the farms have been lost to active farming,the farmhouses have been converted into luxury homes,with the land being used as paddocks.This is particularly true of the eastern side of the area.Farm cottages have been sold off and have been converted to week_end cottages. This is a quiet rural area set in attractive surroundings,with easy access to London,which provides a constant demand for week_end and holiday accomodation.
